includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Castle makes a dramatic return to Beckett’s life, using his left field thinking to aid and infuriate the NYPD detective in equal measure. Third season of the smash-hit U.S. crime drama starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.

includedIn.title: Castle
includedIn.synopsis: After he is asked to help investigate real-life murders copied from his best-selling series, author Rick Castle shadows the NYPD’s Detective Kate Beckett as research for his next book.
